thread.title: Advice for trip planned to Dharamshala/Mcleodganj
thread.title_full: Advice for trip planned to Dharamshala/Mcleodganj

author: ranger_khaleesi
title: Advice for trip planned to Dharamshala/Mcleodganj
text: # 1 Hi guys, I am planning to travel to Dharamshala/Mcleodganj for 2-3 days in October. I am an Indian girl travelling all alone. Any kind of advice from recommended hotels to connectivity to places to visit to even general advice would be of great help.. TIA P.S. - Places that are not too touristy/crowded and are scenic would be of greater interest to me.
